data.message: Haven't liked any of the news feed changes. The top story stuff I don't like at all. Just post everything in order like it once was

replies.message: I agree, I liked it when we could tap the previous, for what we might have missed earlier. And there is wy to much of repeAti
repeating the same stories! But more than anything I do not like that we can't shadow a single article on our page to email. That seems to be blocked. WHY?
you have screwed up again leave face book alone we do not like what you think we should like ...you are trying to force your likes upon us  LEAVE IT ALONE
I don,t like the new look at all.....it looks cheap and sloppy!
I HATE the big format. Why cant you leave things alone!!! I hate Top Stories!!!
Hi, Everybody has the option to pick the Most Recent over the Top Stories. Just click on the Sort button and click Most Recent. Hope that helps. :-)
Don't like it and neither does my boyfriend!
NO NO NO NO....stop with all the changes!   So nice that you change it first and THEN HOPE WE LIKE IT.....NOPE
theres not a sort button on the new format Noel
I agree with everyone else- as the saying goes "if it ain't broke leave it alone"
Look at that column on the left, at the top where it says "Newsfeed" Click on the little triangle arrow and you can choose "Most recent" or "Top Stories"

I HATE the new look.  I DO NOT WANT Top Stories.  FB does not know what my Top Stories are.  I want the MOST RECENT.  I HATE the new look.  Font is hard to read, column is narrower and there is a huge space on the right that is wasted.  Nor do I like the fact that FB CHOSE the photos for the groups I use.  LEAVE IT ALONE.  It isn't broken.  FIND SOMETHING else to do!!!!
